title: Japanese: language and people. [kit]
creator_credit: BBC, Intervoice Incorporated, Terry A. Doyle, Richard Smith, Trevor Hughes Parry and Brian Moeran
brief_description: This excellent kit comprising of five audio cassettes, a teacher manual and student reference book is designed to accompany the ‘Japanese: language and people’ videos. The tapes contain dialogues, exercises and practice material which is closely integrated to the course book. The teacher’s manual contains lesson suggestions in order to provide a strong framework for learning the language, while the course book provides an accessible introduction to the written language along with insights into contemporary Japanese society.
